message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. Given its features and benefits, I'm initially offering it for $18,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe the product is not worth $18,000. Considering its actual value and my budget, I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for it.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the price. While $18,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $16,500. I believe this price point offers a fair balance.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget and the value I see in the product, I would like to propose a price of $15,000.
